name: SoulKeeper (VuZeRevil)
description:
In Soul Keeper you play as  a female character named <Runa>  who got murdered and respawned by the godess Asriel to become the "Soul Keeper".

In this atmospheric jump and run game your task is to free the lost souls that transformed into demons like beasts and get revenge on the demon lord who murdered your entire village.

In the following you can see some of the used assets:

I hope you enjoy the little challenges and leave some feedback in the comments :) 

Have fun 

Credits 

Epidemic Sound for the great tunes.

HTK Academy for the great lecturers.
